entry.title: Summary: Covenants Support - Bitcoin Wiki
entry.summary: In the ongoing discussions within the Bitcoin Development Mailing List, Jonas Nick has shared his objections regarding a specific topic. Those interested in exploring his detailed rationale can find it documented comprehensively at [his gist](https://gist.github.com/jonasnick/e9627f56d04732ca83e94d448d4b5a51). The conversation is open for further comments and insights, allowing members of the community to contribute to the discourse. This exchange underscores the collaborative nature of the development process, inviting diverse perspectives to refine and enhance the discussion at hand.
